text: i think that's true inclusion when not
just you as an individual
but your ideas your perspectives are not
just valued but welcomed and encouraged
that's inclusion right there

hi my name is neha working at public
sector india is extremely gratifying
personally i think that the fact that
you're making an impact to so many lives
across the spectrum of the country and
in general india is a very diverse
nation
so many rural villages so many walks of
life
and you're doing the work right now to
make sure that they have a better life
and that's extremely robotic everyone at
the india public sector team at aws is
driven
and connected by a common goal of making
a positive
impact so be the professional services
team the ldrs the partner managers the
bds
the solution architects they're all
driven by the single goal
of making it better for our customers be
it innovating on their behalf or solving
a customer problem
we're doing our best to make sure that
the customers set up for success
people who tend to do really well at aws
public sector in india
are tenacious that's the one trait i
think that i've seen in
the team around me and they're the ones
who are really
being successful in making a positive
impact
to the customers and the customers
customers they're persistent
and they're go getters and they won't
stop till they achieve their goals
if you think a challenge is an
opportunity come join the team
